title: 3 Books
description:
Chris Klemmer's mind is on one thing and one thing only: Dan 'Big Cat' Katz. Greg Bedard couldn't be more full of shit (00:08:30). Justin is on an absolute tear and today's victim is Michael Geary (00:15:40). Andy Nolan protects himself and his family by giving a non-answer to who he thinks from his high school would have killed Whitey Bulger( 00:36:18). Kirk says it would take him "3 books" to beat Felger & Mazz in the ratings (01:16:00). Hitting the post is back on (02:24:00). A group text from Rico upsets Dave (00:00:30), calls & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
